snippet: For the top-seeded teams in matchups during the Big East tournament at Madison Square Garden, one reward is the opportunity to use the locker room of the arena’s N.B.A. team, the Knicks.
abstract: Top-seeded team in each session of Big East tournament is given honor of using New York Knicks locker room for games at Madison Square Garden; Villanova and Marquette players are wowed by deluxe accommodations
lead_paragraph: For the top-seeded teams in matchups during the Big East tournament at Madison Square Garden, one reward is the opportunity to use the locker room of the arena’s N.B.A. team, the Knicks.

headline.main: At Garden, Top Big East Seeds Try Out Knicks’ Quarters
headline.print_headline: At Garden, Top Big East Seeds Try Out Knicks’ Quarters
